text: Alex Ifeanyichukwu Ekwueme GCON (October 21, 1932 â€“ November 19, 2017) was a Nigerian politician. He was the first elected Vice-President of Nigeria, in office from 1979 to 1983. Ekwueme served during the Shehu Shagari administration. He was born in the Anambra State. He was a member of the National Party of Nigeria. Ekwueme died of complications from a fall at a hospital in London on November 19, 2017 at the age of 85. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Nigerian politicians Category:Vice presidents Category:People from Anambra State
title: Alex Ifeanyichukwu Ekwueme
